ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: OR( AND( ISCHANGED( Account_Status__c ), ISPICKVAL( Account_Status__c ,'Approved'), OR( ISBLANK( TEXT( Legal_Entity__c ) ), ISBLANK( TEXT( Theater__c ) ), ISBLANK( Compliance_Designations__c ), ISBLANK( BillingStreet ), ISBLANK( BillingCity ) , ISBLANK( BillingPostalCode ), ISBLANK( ShippingStreet ), ISBLANK( ShippingCity ) , ISBLANK( Uses_MSA_of__c ) )), AND( ISCHANGED( Account_Status__c ), ISPICKVAL( Account_Status__c ,'Approved'), OR( AND( OR (BillingCountry = "CAN", BillingCountry = "CA", BillingCountry = "Canada"), ISBLANK(BillingState) ), AND( OR (BillingCountry = "USA", BillingCountry ="US", BillingCountry = "United States" ), ISBLANK(BillingState) ), AND( OR (ShippingCountry = "CAN", ShippingCountry = "CA", ShippingCountry = "Canada"), ISBLANK(ShippingState) ), AND( OR (ShippingCountry = "USA", ShippingCountry = "US" , ShippingCountry = "United States"), ISBLANK(ShippingState) ) ) ))
